summary: Fixed MSVC build errors in renderer procedural palette code: properly source depth/maxDepth from Game, remove undefined overlay helper usage, and keep overlay object tinting consistent.

Fixed remaining MSVC build breaks in sprite generation helpers (VTuber holo card borders) and added a subtle deterministic 'glint' modulation for altar/fountain/stairs overlay tiles (scaled by proc_palette strength) to improve readability without breaking pixel-art.
